author: Rebecca Buechel

comments.message: this could also help in homecare when the caregiver doesn't have proper PPE

description: Patients obviously need HCW contact care, but at times when a large number of items need to be handed out in a center, tongs may help.
summary: Tongs can be used when many things (supplies, bottles, towels, rolls of paper)  need to be handed to many different patients while avoiding cross-contamination.
title: tongs  to hand things while minimizing contact when needed
